title: State of the Role: Revealing our Super Top Secret Project!
author: Critical Role
description:
Marisha Ray, Matthew Mercer, and Travis Willingham reveal a secret project we've been hard at work on...

Exandria Unlimited airs on Thursdays at 7pm Pacific beginning June 24th at https://twitch.tv/criticalrole and youtube.com/criticalrole, with rebroadcasts at 12am Pacific and 9am Pacific on Twitch. VOD is available immediately for Critical Roleâ€™s Twitch channel subscribers and will be available at https://youtube.com/criticalrole at 12pm Pacific the following Monday. Audio from Exandria Unlimited will be available the following Thursday on the Critical Role podcast network (Spotify, Google Podcasts, Apple Podcasts, and more).

Learn more about ExU!
Our full announcement article: https://critrole.com/hype-exandria-unlimited-premieres-june-24th
What You Need to Know Before Watching Exandria Unlimited guide: https://critrole.com/what-you-need-to-know-before-watching-exandria-unlimited
